attributes.additional_details: I feel that the government are making decisions that have nothing to do with the British public. We Dont agree to a war. If you want to do to war then you fight in it.
attributes.background: I would like government to not ask or encourage us to fight in a war we don't agree to.

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about military conscription (being required to join the military).

The Government has not announced any plans to introduce conscription, so we're not sure what you want the Government or Parliament to do.
